a.title: Subscribe to RSS Feed
District to Host Remote Institute Day April 27

img.alt: District to Host Remote Institute Day April 27

div.div: District to Host Remote Institute Day April 27

Our District will be hosting its second Remote Institute Day on Monday, April 27. Once again, during the day team members will engage in learning activities to enhance and further develop their ability to deliver and facilitate remote instruction and other services for our students.

div.span: Read More About District to Host Remote Institute Day April 27

a.title: Notice of April 28 Regular Board Meeting

img.alt: Notice of April 28 Regular Board Meeting

div.div: Notice of April 28 Regular Board Meeting

A Regular Meeting of the Board of Education will be held on Tuesday, April 28, 2020, at 7:00 p.m. for Open Session, 5:30 p.m. for Closed Session. As a result of the Governors Stay at Home Executive Order, the special meeting will be conducted remotely via GoToMeeting.

div.span: Read More About Notice of April 28 Regular Board Meeting

a.title: WPS Drive-up WiFi Service Now Available

img.alt: WPS Drive-up WiFi Service Now Available

div.div: WPS Drive-up WiFi Service Now Available

Waukegan Public Schools is excited to announce that we are launching drive-up WiFi service at several of our school parking lots. We understand many individuals may lack reliable high speed internet at home. This new service will allow all students and staff to visit any of the schools listed below to connect to the WiFi from your vehicles.

div.span: Read More About WPS Drive-up WiFi Service Now Available
